text.en: Glorious guru, lord of all the buddha families,
text.en-trans: palden lama rik nam kün gyi dak

text.en: Unique embodiment of all the victors’ wisdom,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi yeshe chik tu dü

text.en: Master of knowledge and love,2Chökyi Lodrö,
Guide and care for me until I reach awakening.
I pray to you with ardent faith and devotion,
text.en-trans: dé mö dungshuk drakpö solwa deb

text.en: Rely on you alone with unwavering confidence and trust.
text.en-trans: ré tö mingyur chikchok gyalpor zung

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings throughout all my lives to come.3
text.en-trans: kyé dang tserab küntu jingyi lob

text.en: Never let me slip from your compassionate embrace.
text.en-trans: tukjé chak gi namyang ma tong shik

text.en: Inspire me to develop the determination to escape conditioned existence,
text.en-trans: si lé ngepar jungwé lo kyé zhing

text.en: To make pure ethical discipline the basis of attaining supreme liberation,
text.en-trans: tar chok tsultrim tsangmar zhir ché té

text.en: To train my mind and master supreme bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: changchub sem chok gyü la jongpa dang

text.en: And to realize the profound nature of reality.
